posts.post_title: Buying or trading for W600 & Carl Horner Cabinets
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jim Clarke
Wow! I haven't checked into the board until now?  I can't believe all postings on a b/s/t thread.  

I don't have any hard feelings on Scott's remark.. I know him pretty well and I could tell that he is just teasing a little.  Scott actually made the post first about the W600 Cabinets a month or so ago.  

I think that any seller of these GR8 cabinets would love to have two or three of us battle it out for them.  

I know it's hard to keep track of everyone, and who knows who.   
Brian Daniels writing pattern is the hardest to interpret.

Leon is pretty EZ to figure out.. When he uses the smiley face [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/happy.gif[/IMG] logo that means he is happy and kidding.. When he uses the angry face [IMG]https://www.net54baseball.com/images/sad.gif[/IMG] logo he is mean and serious...

JC
